resources.string: Avoid sleep mode while camera active
Force the screen to maximum brightness
Shutter with fast switching to video mode
Activate screens swiping - changing info control on main screen
Skip non secure lock keyguard when device is turned on
Select if preview proportions are incorrect
In case of manual exposure and long time image on viewfinder and result will differ to avoid slow preview update. Enabling this option you will have real picture on viewfinder, but low fps.
